bug.summary: [Bug] Not able to process audio file which is larger than 2500 seconds. Getting '3221226505' as an error.
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
Having audio file of 80 mins and trying to use Spleeter to extract the vocal signal from that audio. But I am not able to process that audio file and getting '3221226505' as an error. <denchmark-h:h2>Step to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Here, I am running with below command where I specified the duration as '2500 seconds' to extract the audio of that duration. But its not working, Though it is working with '2000 seconds'. spleeter separate -i THENUN.flac -p spleeter:2stems -d 2500 -o output1
Installed using pip install spleeter in Conda environment Run as either as command line in Conda env or in Jupyter notebook with subprocess Getting 'python stopped working` error in Command line. where getting '3221226505' in jupyter notebook
<denchmark-h:h2>Output</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h2>Environment</denchmark-h>
OS Windows Server 2016
Installation type In Conda via pip
RAM available 16 GB
Hardware spec CPU . Intel Xeon 2.30GHz
